''Sub-chiefs:'' [[Fazal (Earth-616)|Fazal]]{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #35}} ---- ''Chieftains:'' [[Hasra Khalli (Earth-616)|Hasra Khalli]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = ''[[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]] and [[Olgerd Vladislav (Earth-616)|Olgerd Vladislav]]'s Zuagirs:'' [[Amin (Zuagir) (Earth-616)|Amin]], [[Amul (Earth-616)|Amul]], [[Antar (Earth-616)|Antar]], [[Barlegh (Earth-616)|Barlegh]], [[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]], [[Dirdar (Earth-616)|Dirdar]], [[Djebal (Earth-616)|Djebal]], [[Farra (Earth-616)|Farra]], [[Fazal (Earth-616)|Fazal]], [[Garn (Earth-616)|Garn]], [[Gomer (Earth-616)|Gomer]], [[Hathaan (Earth-616)|Hathaan]], [[Olgerd Vladislav (Earth-616)|Olgerd Vladislav]], [[Salim (Earth-616)|Salim]], [[Shallim (Earth-616)|Shallim]], [[Vardanes (Earth-616)|Vardanes]], unnamed [[Bahreen Kel Akif]] guardsman ---- ''[[Hasra Khalli (Earth-616)|Hasra Khalli]]'s Zuagirs:'' [[Ignar (Zuagir) (Earth-616)|Ignar]], [[Tamusa (Earth-616)|Tamusa]], [[Taghro (Earth-616)|Taghro]], between a hundred and a hundred and a half men ---- ''Other tribes:'' '''[[Duali (Earth-616)|Duali]]''',{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Shem (Hyboria)|Shem]]'s entry}} '''[[Kharoya]]''',{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Shem (Hyboria)|Shem]]'s entry}} '''[[Qirlata]]'''{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Shem (Hyboria)|Shem]]'s entry}} | Allies = [[Alwazir (Earth-616)|Alwazir]]; Formerly [[Hidden Ones (Hyborian Age) (Earth-616)|Sons of Yezm]] | Enemies = [[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]], [[Olgerd Vladislav (Earth-616)|Olgerd Vladislav]], [[Vardanes (Earth-616)|Vardanes]] ---- [[Abode of the Damned]], [[Hidden Ones (Hyborian Age) (Earth-616)|Sons of Yezm]], [[Urwallah (Earth-616)|Urwallah]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #28}} [[Turan]], [[Onan Bahk Galeen (Earth-616)|Sultan Onan Bahk Galeen]] of the [[Bahreen Kel Akif|Desert Sultanate of Bahreen Kel Akif]] | Origin = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Robert E. Howard; Roy Thomas; John Buscema; | First = Savage Sword of Conan #5 | Last = | Overview = The [[Duali (Earth-616)|Duali tribe]] lived in near [[Fort Wakla]] in the [[Eastern Desert]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #31|; A Gazetteer of the Hyborian Age Part II, [[Duali (Earth-616)|Duali]]'s entry}} | HistoryText = History of team is unknown. ==[[Code of the Desert]]== The Code of the Desert is a code of honor and rules of the Zuagirs: * A former Zuagir war-chief can demand the chance to regain his position by facing an opponent.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #35}} It is unclear if the opponent has to be the most powerful of them or their leader. * The code demands the death of five stakes for a man who betrays his comrades.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #35}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
